skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Front-end web development involves creating the visual and interactive aspects of a website that users engage with directly. It utilizes HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build responsive and user-friendly interfaces.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: Back-end web development involves server-side logic, database management, and application functionality. It ensures efficient, secure, and scalable web applications using server-side languages.

skills.title: Databases
skills.description: A database is an organized collection of data stored electronically, allowing efficient management, retrieval, and updating. It uses structured tables, fields, and records to support applications.

skills.title: DSA
skills.description: Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) focuses on organizing data and solving problems efficiently using structures like arrays and trees, and techniques for sorting searching and sliding windows.

portfolio.title: E-Commerce Website
portfolio.description: Discover a seamless shopping experience with our intuitive e-commerce platform, offering a vast selection of products at unbeatable prices. Enjoy fast, secure checkout and exceptional customer service every step of the way.

portfolio.title: X-Clone
portfolio.description: Introducing my self-made Twitter clone, a fully functional social media platform where users can tweet, follow others, and engage with real-time updates. Built with a focus on performance and user experience.

portfolio.title: Number System Converter
portfolio.description: Explore my Number System Converter project, designed to effortlessly convert numbers between different bases such as binary, decimal, hexadecimal, and octal. This tool highlights my proficiency in algorithm and design.
